website_summaries.verdict: Low price point for four different seasoning options. Works well for meat, potatoes, and vegetables.
pros: Popular brand for all kinds of spices
Delivers a nice mix of flavors for several food types
Good price per ounce versus some other seasonings and rubs
Nice basic set for someone new to grilling
cons: May receive some duplicates in the set
Not as bold as some other seasonings

customer_reviews.title: Health problems stop me from going to store much as I like.Order alot from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Not happy after ordering 4 pack of grill Mate Seasonings. Soon as I got them, I unscrewed the caps to make sure seals were still in place. Seal was missing on the one labeled {Barbecue} could tell some was missing but took no chance that someone put something in it.Put it in the trash !
customer_reviews.author: John Bierman

customer_reviews.title: Misleading, did not receive Garlic seasoning.
customer_reviews.text: They did not provide the Roasted Garlic seasoning, instead just gave me an extra Montreal Chicken seasoning. I love the seasoning, but am dissapointed with the false advertising as I really wanted the Garlic seasoning. 3 stars for 3 accurate seasonings. I would have provided a bonus star if all seasonings were included.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Essential
customer_reviews.text: These are the essentials and you cant beat the price buying them individually. Montreal steak is the only way to eat a steak or hamburger here. The others are great for adding flavor to veggies and pasta. If you were only to have 4 spices in your kitchen, make them these.
customer_reviews.author: ncr515

customer_reviews.title: Dad Likes
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my dad with an indoor grill for Fathers Day. Every day he calls me to let me know what new food he’s seasoned with this set. He’s satisfied to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty
customer_reviews.text: The flavors are very tasty. I have used them for many different things. Easy to use and easy to store in the pantry. I like the robust flavors and that they are coarsely cut spices and not finely ground so many are so fine that it was hard to find a good one that was coarsely cut. I like them and will most likely order more as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great flavors
customer_reviews.text: We specifically wanted the chipotle flavor which is hard to find. Bonus to try the other flavors as well.
customer_reviews.author: T. J.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for men and family.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves to grill. Gives my daughter in law a break from cooking. A very welcomed gift for a man. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Debra in FL

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed I received four different forms of the same spice... I thought that I would be receiving a variety.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Let's just say SALTY.
customer_reviews.text: SALT is the first ingredient so expect to taste SALT ! Odd that in a world of so many spices that SALT would be so abundant in these. Tasty, yes, but very SALTY. If you have concerns about sodium be warned.
customer_reviews.author: devildog

customer_reviews.title: BEST VALUE FOR THE SET
customer_reviews.text: VERY WELL PKGD, NICE SIZE BOTTLES, SEASONINGS SMELL FANTASTIC, EXP DATE IS ON BOX & BOTTLES. BEST VALUE YOU CAN GET. PERFECT
customer_reviews.author: nettie

customer_reviews.title: Great spices for all your eating needs.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent spices. I use these on almost everything. Great tasting! Excellent shipper no issues, accurate as described. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great value for the money and good flavor combinations
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good deal and all the seasonings enhance the flavor of your food especially on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: by Kathleen (Your signature)

customer_reviews.title: Very good flavor
customer_reviews.text: It is the best price I have found for these. Great flavors I use the hamburger one the most.
customer_reviews.author: suzie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set but...
customer_reviews.text: Great set of Spices but I'm pretty sure that the Hamburger version uses artificial chemicals to imitate smoke smell and taste which is not good. US already at 6th worlds rank of cancer diseases and they keep feeding us with that stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Awesom
customer_reviews.text: I griddle 3 or 4 times a week and McCormick is always there to give me that special kick. Montreal Steak is my fav
customer_reviews.author: Richard Clark

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: This group now does all of my seasoning perfectly. They are all good seasonings for different things.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: I ordered because it's McCormick
customer_reviews.text: I use McCormick seasonings and this combo pack is perfect and priced well.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn R.

customer_reviews.title: Best flavors! A must in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these. They give food such great flavor!! My favorite go to spices. Your soup comes out great. The meat. Everything!
customer_reviews.author: GeorgiannGordon

customer_reviews.title: read suggested uses
customer_reviews.text: with the monteral was the spicy one, but good for seasoning most meat and fish
customer_reviews.author: Doty M.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a very good season.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product very much. An I used this product for marinating my meats
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: Great products for a variety of flavors, meats, salads, soups
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: It added to the taste and was a great improvement in many dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Lavona S. Greer

customer_reviews.title: Mix it up
customer_reviews.text: A great array of different spice mixes for a change.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set. Bought for my son for a moving out care package
customer_reviews.author: Erin S.

customer_reviews.title: Frequently used Spices in a Pack
customer_reviews.text: Nice Gift Pack of frequently used items or for a shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: D. Haflett

customer_reviews.title: Super Great Product
customer_reviews.text: You haven't eaten great Lamb Chops until you sprinkle White Magic Dry Rub Spice Powder onto the chops before grilling them. A truly great addition to all recommended usages
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Camilla

customer_reviews.title: Easy and flavorful
customer_reviews.text: All were good but chicken and herb seasoning is very salty.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Best Essential BBQING mix!
customer_reviews.text: Good Combination to put in my Camper! great size! perfect for all types of meals!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Was supposed to be a grilling 4 pack. Received 2 of 2 seasons not 4 different ones.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Zinck

product_meta.title: McCormick Grill Mates Spices, Everyday Grilling Variety Pack (Montreal Steak, Montreal Chicken, Roasted Garlic & Herb, Hamburger), 4 Count
product_meta.description: Flavor:Everyday Blends Grilling Variety PackShake up your grilling game with the McCormick Grill Mates Everyday Blends Grilling Variety Pack. Conveniently bundled for the grill master, it’s the perfect starter kit for a new kitchen or an easy way to expand your flavor collection. Contains: Montreal Steak Seasoning, Montreal Chicken Seasoning, Roasted Garlic & Herb Seasoning and Hamburger Seasoning. With these bold Grill Mates seasonings, you’re covered on rubs, tenderizing, grilling, roasting and more. Go beyond meat: try Montreal Steak Seasoning on pizza and Roasted Garlic & Herb Seasoning in mashed potatoes. This boxed set is the perfect housewarming gift for newlyweds or a recent college grad.
feature_bullets: Four most loved Grill Mates Seasonings together in one set
Add deep flavor to salads with Roasted Garlic and Herb Seasoning
Easily add bold flavor to steaks, burgers, chicken and more on your grill
Grilling spices make a great housewarming gift for everyone
Not just for meat Add umami flavor to mashed potatoes and roasted veggies

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
